name: Modify test details

testSteps.description: 1: Modify test details ({testName=Amylase, newTestName=Amylase updated, LOINC=82092-8, resultType=Numeric})

children.description: Given User logins and Visits Home Page
Given User clicks admin menu link
Then User clicks Test Management left menu item link
And User Clicks on modify tests link on the test management menu
Then User checks show Guide checkbox
Then User unchecks show Guide checkbox
And User clicks on one of the available tests "Amylase"
Then Change Test Name both english and french "Amylase updated"
And Click on Copy from Test Name "Amylase updated"
And Test Name,Reporting Test Name, Test Section and Result Type are mandatory
And Test Section : click on dropbox and select section
And LOINC test field accepts text "82092-8"
And Panel : click on dropbox and select option
Then Unit of Measure : click on dropbox and select option
And Result Type : click on dropbox and select option "Numeric"
Then user clicks Click on Next
And Sample Type is mandatory
Then click on Next button
Then Click on Edit Result Ranges button "Numeric"
And Enter appropriate ranges "Numeric"
Then User clicks Click on Next button after entering Result ranges
Then Click on Accept button

testSteps.description: 2: Modify test details ({testName=Bioline, newTestName=Bioline updated, LOINC=15052-2, resultType=Select List})

title: Modify test details

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given User clicks admin menu link
Then User clicks Test Management left menu item link
And User Clicks on modify tests link on the test management menu
Then User checks show Guide checkbox
Then User unchecks show Guide checkbox
And User clicks on one of the available tests "<testName>"
Then Change Test Name both english and french "<newTestName>"
And Click on Copy from Test Name "<newTestName>"
And Test Name,Reporting Test Name, Test Section and Result Type are mandatory
And Test Section : click on dropbox and select section
And LOINC test field accepts text "<LOINC>"
And Panel : click on dropbox and select option
Then Unit of Measure : click on dropbox and select option
And Result Type : click on dropbox and select option "<resultType>"
Then user clicks Click on Next
And Sample Type is mandatory
Then click on Next button
Then Click on Edit Result Ranges button "<resultType>"
And Enter appropriate ranges "<resultType>"
Then User clicks Click on Next button after entering Result ranges
Then Click on Accept button
